text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Can you go one day...one hour without lying, doing something illegal, Grifting, or just being a selfish jerk who doesn't care that we have the worst COVID-19 stats in the WORLD and our economy is in the toilet and people are about to be homeless with no protections?

Nope.
